ThingDef.Name: QBU_TOOE_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona QBU-301E charged sniper
ThingDef.description: The first generation of charged snipers.Due to the limitation of technology, it is bulky and complicated, but it is extremely accurate.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: QBU_sixsix_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona QBU-66 charged sniper
ThingDef.description: A heavy anti-vehicle sniper developed in 2060s, its 20mm unstable charged-shots explodes violently upon contact with objects.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: CMC_QBUS85X_Flame_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona QBU-85SF
ThingDef.description: A product of reverse engineering from hellsphere cannon, its fuel bullet can penetrate all kinds of armors.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: CMC_QBXfiveseven_CSG_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona QBX-57C shotgun
ThingDef.description: A charged shotgun designed to strike large number of enemies. 9 accelerated metal slugs within the coin will form a sector killing zone.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: CMC_QBXninenine_CSG_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona QBX-99C shotgun
ThingDef.description: An advanced shotgun developed form QBX-57C, it is quicker to fire and releases more metal slugs per shot.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: QBZ_fivenine_MOD_X_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona QBZ 59 Assault Rifle Mod X
ThingDef.description: A prototype charged assault rifle based on QBZ-59.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: QBZ_fivenine_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona QBZ-59C-QL assault rifle
ThingDef.description: A second-generation charged-shot assault rifle named after the god of thunder, QiangLiang. This rifle fires high-penetration bullets at rapid rate and its large-capacity magazine allows it to effectively suppress enemies at medium to close range.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: QBB_fivenine_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona QBB-59C-QL LMG
ThingDef.description: A light machine gun designed based on QBZ-59C. It provides fire support for squads.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: QBZ71_QS_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona QBZ-71H smart combat rifle
ThingDef.description: A heavy combat rifle firing 8mm charged bullets, it is bulky but extremely accurate.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: QBZ_threeooE_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona QBZ-301E-HT assault rifle
ThingDef.description: Developed in the 2030s, QBZ-301 is a pioneer in charged assault rifles. Due to the limitation of technology, it is bulky, complicated and inaccurate.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: W85XWJ_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona QBB85X smart LMG
ThingDef.description: A smart LMG firing guide bullets, it can also switch mode to fire normal under emergency situations.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: CMC_QBU71S_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona QBU-71 smart anti-vehicle sniper
ThingDef.description: A smart anti-vehicle sniper developed from QBU-66, small antimatter warhead in its bullet causes more violent explosion.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: QBU71_QS_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona QBU-71-JW tactical sniper
ThingDef.description: A multi-functional tactical sniper modified from QBU-71, its experimental bullets containing mechanites provides two modes: paralyze its foes, or completely burn down their Nervous system.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: QBUS85XWJ_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona QBZS-85X smart sniper
ThingDef.description: A smart sniper, it fires guided bullets which can accurately hit moving target at long range regardless of weather conditions.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: QBZS85XWJ_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona QSZ-85-X smart SMG
ThingDef.description: A smart SMG developed by CMC in the 2080s, equipped with the latest fire control system and micro guided bullets. One significant feature of this SMG is its ability to trace moving target regardless of weather conditions.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: CMC_GrenadeLauncher_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona QL-40 neutron grenade launcher
ThingDef.description: An individual multi-functional grenade launcher, can switch between two ammo types: neutron grenade and stun grenade.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: CMC_HJX_ATGM_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona HJ-53 ATGM Launcher
ThingDef.description: An individual anti-tank missile launcher, equipped with HJ-53 light ATGM missile.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: PrototypeXiHe_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona Prototype XiHe flameblaster
ThingDef.description: An advanced spacer burst-oriented flamethrower with long range, very efficient against organism and also able to melt mechanoids' armors.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: QLUX_Pulse_Projector_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona QLU-X individual siege cannon
ThingDef.description: Named after Zhu Rong, the god of fire for its devastating power, QLU-X is a powerful pulse projector used by PLA in 2080s.Due to its high accuracy and long range of fire, QLU-X is able to easily suppress enemy battle positions, bunkers and slower targets. It must hold a bead on its target for several seconds while charging, before it releases a devastating tsunami of power. The explosion is capable of melting concrete in its blast radius. The heat of the explosion will ignite anything nearby. It cannot fire at close-up targets to prevent friendly fire.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: QLUX_Pulse_Projector_Persona_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona QLU-X-ZHII individual plasma siege cannon
ThingDef.description: A prototype plasma cannon originated of QLU-X, with enhanced firepower. Its energy pulse can also emit EMP burst upon contact.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: CMM_PLaserpistol_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona QSC-79P pistol
ThingDef.description:
A prototype laser pistol, it can target three enemies simultaneously. 

Damage: 8-4-4 with 10s of burning upon hit. Target enemies within 4 tiles.

This weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: CMC_PLaserSMG_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona QBZL-79P SMG
ThingDef.description:
A prototype laser SMG, can target three enemies simultaneously. 

Damage: 10-5-5 with 10s of burning upon hit. Target enemies within 5 tiles.

This weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: CMC_PLaserLMG_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona QBZL-79P LMG
ThingDef.description:
A prototype laser LMG, can attack four enemies simultaneously. 

 Damage: 15-15-8-8 with 10s of burning upon hit. Target enemies within 6 tiles.

This weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: CMC_ShapedLaserRifle_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona QBZL-55 Laser Rifle
ThingDef.description: First generation of laser rifle, it is very effective against close-ranged targets.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: CMC_ShenLongLaserLMG_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona QBZL-102P ShenLong LMG
ThingDef.description: A prototype laser LMG, can attack seven enemies simultaneously, the greater the number of enemies in range, the more powerful this laser gun is.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: CMC_QSZfiveseven_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona QSZ-57 PDW
ThingDef.description: A personal-defense weapon based on ancient blowback-operated self-loading pistol. It is light to carry and quick to fire, which makes it popular among pilots and frontier explorers.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: Bullet_AutocannonTurretEMP_Bond
ThingDef.label: accelerated magnet projectile(antimatter warhead with EMP cells)
